app.title: Starter Template
app.heading: Tauri v2 + React 19 + Tailwind Starter
app.subheading: A minimal shell with custom title bar, theme & i18n, Shadcn UI, and a Tauri ping example. Build your app on this skeleton.

ui.theme_hint: Toggle light / dark with a view transition animation.
ui.dialog_desc: Use this space for your forms or confirmations.

loader.subtitle: Starting
loader.title: Loading workspace...
loader.hint: We will open the main window once assets are ready.

demo.title: Routing demonstration
demo.desc: A second page to prove router wiring works. Add your own routes here.

quickstart.title: Quick start
quickstart.desc: A few common UI patterns already wired.

theme.title: Theme
theme.desc: View-transition theme toggle in the title bar. Reuse ThemeProvider and CustomTitleBar.

layout.title: Layout
layout.desc: Container grid + cards by default. Swap in routes or dashboards freely.

components.title: Components
components.desc: Shadcn UI is ready: Button, Card, Tabs, Dialog, Toast styles.

tauri.title: Tauri
tauri.desc: Sample invoke → Rust command. Put your logic in src-tauri/src/lib.rs.

immersive.title: Immersive mode
immersive.desc: Hide extra borders to focus on content.

ping.title: Call backend command:
ping.empty: Click the button above to see the result.

cards.title: Base cards
cards.desc: Place lists, metrics, or welcome info here.

decoupled.title: Decoupled
decoupled.desc: Keep domain logic in src/ and src-tauri/ by feature.

extendable.title: Extensible
extendable.desc: Add routes, dashboards, or forms quickly.

interactions.title: UI interactions
interactions.dialog_body: Put forms or confirmations here; styled for light/dark.
